name: Keep
description: A central keep provides the last line of defense and houses the most important residents, offering maximum security but limited space. The restricted access creates exclusivity and protection, while the confined quarters can feel claustrophobic or secure depending on circumstances.
atmosphere: The central tower houses the lord's private chambers while thick walls protect valuable treasures and important prisoners. Guard patrols maintain constant vigilance on narrow staircases. The air carries stone, authority, and ancient power. Royal apartments overlook defensive positions from the highest floors.
